PARAGRAPH.STRING: , GCMG , KCB (December 5, 1875 - November 30, 1933) was the first Canadian commander of the Canadian Expeditionary Force (a corps of four divisions) on the Western Front during World War I.
was among the most successful generals of the war;
is still considered one of the finest commanders in Canadian military history.

capable leadership the Canadian Corps won a long series of battles, fighting as a unit for the first time in a major war. They soon earned a fierce reputation as some of the most effective troops on the Western Front.
